title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Ticonderoga Pre‑Sharpened #2 Pencils (30 Pack)

Simple to use:
- Ready to write right out of the box. No sharpening needed.
- Standard #2 lead works for notes, puzzles, crosswords, and forms.

Easy to hold and see:
- Bright yellow body is easy to spot in a drawer or bag.
- Thick, strong core makes clear, dark lines without pressing hard.

Clean erasing:
- Soft, latex‑free eraser removes marks cleanly with little smudge.
- Secure green-and-gold metal holder keeps the eraser in place.

Reliable quality:
- Made from premium wood that sharpens smoothly if needed.
- Non‑toxic and PMA certified for safety.
- Trusted Ticonderoga brand with over 100 years of craftsmanship.
- A favorite in schools and offices, known for consistency.

What you get:
- 30 pre‑sharpened yellow pencils, #2 HB softness.

Good for:
- Writing letters, making lists, crosswords, journaling, and everyday notes.
- Gentle on hands, clear on paper, and dependable every day.
